programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I've Seen Him Hit Her
programme.desc: Valarie is here to get custody of her children because she says their father Roy has been abusing them. Roy says that it's her boyfriend who is the abuser. Then, Jennifer is here to because she want's her sister Amber to leave her boyfriend Ceasarae.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Mommy Hurt Me
programme.desc: Stephanie’s drug addiction led her to severely neglect and abuse their children. As Scott’s fiancée Amy has stepped in as a mother and Stephanie fails multiple drug tests, he doesn’t want her near the children, but wants her to atone for her wrongs!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Steve's Gang Intervention
programme.desc: When this young man says that he'd kill his own mother if the gang asked him to, Steve decides to hold an intervention. With the help of an ex-gang member, they try to speak some truth into this gangster from suburbia.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Want Him To Love Me
programme.desc: Mindy wants Michael to step up to the plate, be a father, and help support his child. His new girlfriend Tanya also wants Michael to be involved in his child's life, but after hearing the lie detector results, she too might question her man.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: 13 Year Old Father?
programme.desc: Curtis sat down with his mother Telisha, and told her that he is trying to have a baby but Telisha was shocked and terrified because Curtis is only 13 years old! Curtis insists he is ready to be a father.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You're Certain He's The Father?/Why Didn't You Tell Me?
programme.desc: Grace wants to expose ex-boyfriend Kenny for destroying her teen years and denying their child. Then, Kendra suspects boyfriend Brandon is cheating on her with his ex Monique, and she thinks he has the STD to prove it!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Mommy, Go To Jail For Me
programme.desc: In order to avoid charges, Christi abandons her ten year old daughter and leaves the state. Her daughter wants to give her one last chance to take responsibility and be in her life.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Want Justice for My Daughter
programme.desc: Cassey believes she recently uncovered her ex-husband Calvin’s evil deeds, which he was trying to cover up with gifts for his daughter, but did he actually molest her daughter? Or has she had it all wrong?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Does My Husband Have a Creepy Addiction?
programme.desc: Jennifer fears that her husband Tim is addicted to teenage porn and has heard rumors of him sneaking underage girls into their house. Is Amanda’s man a child molester and peeping Tom? How will these wives react to the lie detector test results?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You’re Stealing My Daughter’s Childhood
programme.desc: Tonya is here to stop her 14-year-old daughter Talia from ruining her life before she’s an adult. She doesn’t approve of her boyfriend Jerry who needs to get out of her daughter’s life because he’s responsible for everything that’s wrong with her.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Do Not Touch Her on My Stage
programme.desc: Scott and Dawn want their sister Betty to leave her abusive boyfriend Michael of 11 months. Michael says Betty abuses him, too, but Scott and Dawn don’t believe him. The drama will explode when Scott confronts Michael on our stage today!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Why Aren't You A Father
programme.desc: Jeremy hasn't seen his child in four years, but after coming clean, he wants to right the wrongs that he's done. Julie, his ex and mother of their child, doesn't buy it, claiming that he spends more time with his new girlfriends child than his own.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Not A Big Shocker
programme.desc: Secrets revealed ... Since the start of their relationship, Nareda has slowly been discovering more and more of Kenny's secrets. On their wedding day, she first learned that he had lied about his age and was only 18 years old, much younger than she. She also came to learn he was verbally and physically abusive. Now that she suspects he's been cheating, she wants the truth, and she's making a final decision on her misleading relationship.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: If You Didn't Shake Your Son, Why Did You Confess?
programme.desc: A year ago, Jessica confessed to violently shaking her infant son and causing him severe brain injuries. But now Jessica has recanted and claims that a sippy cup caused his injuries. Be sure to tune in to hear the truth!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Wait! Don’t Read the Results Yet Steve…
programme.desc: Sharina thinks that Clarence is cheating on her because he’s always staying out late. Plus, Chrystal doesn’t want Earnie’s ex Tenyia to stay with them just because she’s the mother of his child. Is he also cheating on her?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Did He Abuse My Son?
programme.desc: Heather is 17 years old and she says her boyfriend Anthony is the father of her child. But Anthony thinks his brother, Tracy is the father. Then, Roxana believes her two-year-old nephew was beaten by his mother Kyesha.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: He Makes Me Have Sex With His Friends
programme.desc: Ashley believes her husband Michael may have molested their 3 year old son. Michael says she is making up this entire story so she can divorce him. Next, Anjail believes Dwight has been physically abusing their son.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: My Son Said You Beat Him
programme.desc: Davonna believes that her husband Michael never abused her son. Her son told his dad Brandon that Michael punched him in the nose and back. Then, Evie wants to prove that she never abused her son and deserves custody of him from her mother!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Got a Bad Feeling About This
programme.desc: Ashley and DeNorris accuse each other of cheating; Jim denies having sex with his fiancee's sister and underage girls.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: An Unexpected Confession
programme.desc: Marlon claims he caught Bernard molesting his own nephew two years ago! Bernard and his sister accuse Marlon of lying! Later, Tarone found out his sister’s boyfriend Donald molested their daughter. Donald says he mistook her for her aunt Felitha!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: A Shocking Betrayal
programme.desc: Korey is positive that his girlfriend Dominique is cheating on him and is also worried that she might be a prostitute. She says that his suspicions have caused him to become abusive. Then, Gregory thinks that his girlfriend Robin isn’t faithful!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: The Lighter Side of Steve
programme.desc: Steve's looking back on some of the funniest moments from his show. You'll definitely laugh out loud at these unforgettable guests. Don't miss one second of the fun on today's Steve Wilkos Show.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Hope I'm Not The Father
programme.desc: Lorie gave birth to twin boys, and while she initially thought boyfriend Carlos was the father, she would later believe it was actually Warren, a claim he strongly denies. Warren wants Lorie to stop harassing him about being the father.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Teen Girls In Trouble
programme.desc: Dorothy is 17 years old and has felt so uncomfortable living at home with her mom and stepdad, that she has resorted to selling her body to take care of herself. Then, Connie says her ex pressured her to get pregnant at 16 and then refused to help her support their child.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Believe My Son!
programme.desc: Josephine's family was ripped apart after her boyfriend Mark was accused of molestation. Her son, Anthony and his girlfriend, Renee believe Mark molested their 2 year old son. But Mark believes that Renee coached her son to say this!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Are My Husband and Daughter Having Sex?
programme.desc: Holly says her mother is envious of her and has made up accusations that she has been sleeping with her stepfather; Jovanni reacts to his girlfriend's ironclad proof that he is cheating.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: My Kids Watch Him Hit Me
programme.desc: Jared says that he is positive that his wife Sarah is cheating on him and he admits to physically abusing Sarah because he says he hates being lied to. Sarah, who is pregnant, says that she's desperate to stop Jared's abusing ways.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You're Not the Father, I Borrowed a Baby
programme.desc: Noah and Kendra had a yearlong fling, but when he finally visited her, she had a baby and claimed he was the father! Marvin and Rainy have been married for almost 6 years, but two weeks ago, she received a call saying that Marvin had cheated on her!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Young Mothers Accused of Abuse
programme.desc: Anthony believes his ex, Erica and her new boyfriend Jeremy are abusing his son. Next, Lacey is being accused, by her aunt, of physically abusing and neglecting her two young children.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Steve, I'm Not An Abuser
programme.desc: Brandi and Marty have been together 5 years. Brandi's brother and her mother claim that Marty is being physically abusive and has been cheating. Plus, Jessica worries that Derwin is now cheating on her and claims that he's been abusive towards her.
